textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Australian brand MINKPINK was launched 2005 by designer Rachel Evans. Founded on a philosophy of embracing individuality, the brand offers style-conscious, yet playful options for the everyday girl. Evans pulls inspiration from Sydney street style and the sun-soaked beaches of her home base, resulting in the signature lighthearted aesthetic of MINKPINK apparel. See all MINKPINK reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
